text: Izhitsa or Izhica (Ѵ, ѵ; italics: Ѵ ѵ; OCS: Ѷжица, Russian: Ижица, Ukrainian: Іжиця) is a letter of the early Cyrillic alphabet and several later alphabets, usually the last letter. == Appearance and phonetic usage == Izhitsa.svg Cyrillic letter Izhitsa with double grave accent.svg Phonetic usage: /v/ /i/ /ē/ Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Izhitsa
